header_text: You like to volunteer at your local animal shelter. Recently, you helped a rescue dog who liked to jump on people. With your balance challenges, being around the dog made you uneasy.

elements.text: You quickly warmed up to the dog and realized that you could control their behavior with treats. Knowing how to handle them made you feel...
